meanings.definition: Unable to be verified or confirmed.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious creature's existence was uncheckable.
meanings.sent2: The authenticity of the ancient artifact was uncheckable.
meanings.sent3: The rumor about the ghost in the attic was uncheckable.
meanings.sent4: The truth behind the legend remained uncheckable.
meanings.sent5: The secret code's validity was uncheckable.

meanings.definition: Not able to be stopped or controlled.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's energy was uncheckable by his parents.
meanings.sent4: The flood of emotions was uncheckable in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The laughter at the comedy show was uncheckable.

meanings.sent1: The athlete's speed was uncheckable on the track.
meanings.sent2: The river's flow was uncheckable after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The excitement of the children was uncheckable during the party.
meanings.sent4: The creativity of the artist was uncheckable in her paintings.
meanings.sent5: The joy in her heart was uncheckable on her wedding day.
